name: Frontier Technology
tagline: A Cloud Computing and Managed Services Provider
description:
Frontier is a leading IT Infrastructure and cloud solution provider focused on providing data security and management solutions. Clients are increasingly looking to the cloud as a method of delivering cost efficient and agile IT services, we offer objective and pragmatic advice to help you select appropriate approaches, wherever that data may be; public, private and hybrid cloud platforms, on-premise infrastructure or combinations of these.
Founded in 2005 by a team of experienced IT professionals, we design, implement & support data centre solutions that secure client’s data, while accelerating business processes, simplifying management & reducing costs. We offer solutions from leading technology vendors, including traditional server, storage & network systems, data security applications, such as email security, identity & privilege access management, automated pen testing & unified communications, plus our own suite of managed services, e.g.:
Frontier Hosting Service: IaaS
Frontier Vault Service: Backup, Archive & Compliance
Frontier Continuity Service: Business Continuity & Disaster Recovery
Frontier Monitoring Service: Proactive system monitoring, management & reporting
Frontier operates its own data centres, providing secure hosting, data management & business continuity services to clients, giving us valuable perspective that is leveraged reviewing IT infrastructure, data security & management requirements with clients.
